name: Niwashi
description:
Swipe your way through the maze, cut the grass and grow the flowers. It never has been so much fun to be a gardener!

FEATURES:
- Simple swipe-to-move controls
- Relaxed gameplay
- Stress relieving action
- Beautiful art-style
- Handcrafted mazes
- Infinite levels
- Haptic feedback for supported devices
- GameCenter to compete with your friends
- And much more!

Are you ready for a new challenge?
